item.description:
Join the Boston Entrepreneurs Group for the launch of the Business Plan Hot Seat. where entrepreneurs present business plans and get "grilled" by the panel and audience in order to refine their presentation and have a better chance of raising capital. Our first meetup will contain one presentation:

SWIMSUIT UNIVERSITY

Vision:
Swimsuit University brings millions of college students together by creating a community, both online and offline, that is exclusively for them. Using a Spring Break theme, the community is created with a social networking website that focuses on campus and social activities as well as swimsuit calendars that are specific to each college. The company gets students excited by allowing them to model and vote for models in their college's calendars.

Founder:
Kenneth Brown ? Founder, CEO, President - with intimate knowledge of target market and management experience with Starbucks Coffee Company. Domain expert and architect of the Swimsuit U business model and plan.

Attendance is LIMITED, so RSVP Today to attend.
item.name: Business Plan Hot Seat - Swimsuit University Presentation
